item.description:
We will not be having a December meet up since most people will be busy with their Holiday shopping. Our next meet up will be in January from 1:00 - 3:00pm. Hope to see everyone there!

PS - If you would like your dog groomed after them meet up let me know prior to the 17th and we can schedule an appointment with a 25% off discount. If you have any questions give me a call or send me an email.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at the front desk!

group.name: The Greater Boston Active Small Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Active Small Dog February Meetup
